specializations.name: HTML
specializations.description: The foundation of web development, HTML provides the structure for web pages.

courses.name: HTML Basics
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of HTML, including tags, elements, and basic page structure.

courses.name: HTML5 and CSS3 Fundamentals
courses.description: Master HTML5 features and CSS3 styling techniques for modern web development.

courses.name: Semantic HTML
courses.description: Understand the importance of semantic HTML for accessibility and SEO.

specializations.name: CSS
specializations.description: Cascading Style Sheets control the presentation and layout of web pages.

courses.name: CSS Fundamentals
courses.description: Build a strong foundation in CSS with practical examples and projects.

courses.name: Advanced CSS
courses.description: Dive deep into advanced CSS concepts and techniques.

courses.name: CSS Grid and Flexbox
courses.description: Master modern layout techniques with CSS Grid and Flexbox.

specializations.name: JavaScript
specializations.description: A programming language that enables interactive web pages and is essential for front-end development.

courses.name: JavaScript Basics
courses.description: Learn the core concepts of JavaScript programming.

courses.name: ES6 for Everyone
courses.description: Master modern JavaScript features introduced in ES6 and beyond.

courses.name: JavaScript: The Complete Guide
courses.description: Comprehensive JavaScript course covering all aspects of the language.

specializations.name: React
specializations.description: A popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces, especially single-page applications.

courses.name: React for Beginners
courses.description: Get started with React and build your first components.

courses.name: React Official Tutorial
courses.description: Follow the official React documentation and examples.

courses.name: Advanced React
courses.description: Advanced React patterns and best practices.

specializations.name: Vue.js
specializations.description: A progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces.

courses.name: Vue.js Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of Vue.js and start building Vue applications.

courses.name: Vue.js 3 Masterclass
courses.description: Master Vue.js 3 with advanced features and patterns.

courses.name: Nuxt.js for Beginners
courses.description: Build server-side rendered Vue applications with Nuxt.js.

specializations.name: Tools and Workflow
specializations.description: Essential tools for modern front-end development, including version control and build tools.

courses.name: Git and GitHub
courses.description: Master version control with Git and collaborate on GitHub.

courses.name: Webpack Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn to bundle and optimize your JavaScript applications with Webpack.

courses.name: Command Line Basics
courses.description: Essential command line skills for developers.
